title: The Alternative Fix - Analyses | FRONTLINE
cleaned_text: | | Millions of Americans spend billions of dollars annually on dietary supplements—herbal remedies, vitamins, minerals—to treat a multitude of ailments. But most don't know that under current law, there's no guarantee that what's on the label is what's in the bottle, or that what's in the bottle is safe and effective. In these excerpts from their interviews with FRONTLINE, experts discuss the controversy over regulating dietary supplements.
